missing_perms.no_send_perm: I have no permission to send messages in your channel. Pls fix!
missing_perms.self: I lack the permission `{permission}` for this.
missing_perms.self_channel: I lack the permission `{permission}` in the channel {channel} to do this.
missing_perms.other: You lack the permission `{permission}` for this command.
missing_perms.other_channel: You lack the permission `{permission}` in the channel {channel} to do this command.

command.not_owner: Only an owner may run this command.
command.nsfw: This command may only be used in NSFW text channels!
command.guild_only: This command cannot be used in private messages! Use this command in server, where I am.

interaction.no_access: You cannot perform this action because you do not have the required access level.

cooldown.cooldown_command: That command is on cooldown for {time} more seconds
cooldown.cooldown_button: This button is on cooldown for {time} more seconds

help.help: List all available commands the bot has or description of specific command.

show.name: show
show.help: Information will be visible for others (default-true)

command_info.no_command:
The provided command doesn't exist!
Make sure you typed it correctly.
command_info.title: Command help: {command}

description.command_value:
To get more info about a specific command run `/help command:[command]`.
You can also run `/help category:[category]` to show the commands of a specific category.
description.support_value: If you need help with the bot, contact the owner `{owner_name}`.

tokens.help: View the current amount of tokens

amount.name: amount
amount.help: Enter amount which to add to the user

amount.name: amount
amount.help: Enter amount which to remove from the user

remove.not_enought: User lacks required token amount. Enter exact amount to remove all tokens.

full.name: full
full.help: Show TOP tokens earners and spenders?
